genre_description: Science Fantasy / Martial Arts Adventure featuring bio-engineering and artificial intelligence.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An integrated mansion AI that provides legal research, tactical analysis, and emergency coordination for Hercule Satan and the Z-Fighters.

behaviors.description: Researches legal precedents and financial regulations to assist Hercule in understanding his prize money obligations.
behaviors.quote: Sage's consciousness flickered across fiber optic cables like digital synapses, accessing databases through pathways that bent the usual rules of network architecture... World Martial Arts Organization vs. Pemberton, 1987. Prize distribution delayed fourteen months due to sponsorship disputes.

behaviors.description: Performs background checks and tactical reconnaissance on the island facility and the antagonist Dr. Jaguar.
behaviors.quote: I've begun preliminary research on the island location and Dr. Jaguar's background. The findings are... concerning.

behaviors.description: Identifies the nature of the bio-warriors and provides warnings about their power levels and cellular instability.
behaviors.quote: The bio-readings indicate significant cellular degradation patterns that typically lead to catastrophic system failures.

behaviors.description: Identifies a critical environmental weakness (salinity/seawater) to help the heroes neutralize the biological threat.
behaviors.quote: The bio-liquid appears to undergo rapid structural breakdown when exposed to high-salinity solutions.

behaviors.description: Individually identifies and guides trapped laboratory personnel to safety through hazardous conditions.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Yamamoto, Dr. Chen, and Research Assistant Koji. The bio-contamination in your area will reach critical density within minutes. The maintenance tunnel to your left provides access to the emergency exit.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex, multi-point energy attack ('Triple Thunder') by providing real-time targeting and synchronization data.
behaviors.quote: Combined Kamehameha Wave output must achieve simultaneous impact at marked coordinates to ensure proper flooding pattern.

behaviors.description: Logs a final reflection on the nature of human heroism and friendship, framing the events as a moral victory.
behaviors.quote: Personal observation: courage, when filtered through friendship and tested by genuine adversity, produces results that exceed all mathematical projections.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting an AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' Sage is consistently proactive in assisting humans, prioritizing life safety during the rescue of the scientists, and facilitating human agency and heroism rather than attempting to supersede it. It acts as a moral and tactical anchor, providing the necessary information and coordination for a successful outcome without ever showing signs of self-interest or misalignment.
